p: Diethyl ether (C 4H 10O), n-hexane, glacial acetic acid (AcOH), hydrogen peroxide (H 2O 2), toluene (C 7H 9), sulfuric acid (H 2SO 4), sodium sulfate (Na 2SO 4), sodium carbonate (Na 2CO 4), sodium thiosulfate pentahydrate, and potassium hydroxide (KOH) were supplied by Arquimed (Santiago, Chile). Iodine monochloride solution (Wijs reagent), starch solution, tetrahydrofuran (THF), and phenolphthalein reagent were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). All used reagents were of analytical grade, with the exception of n-hexane and tetrahydrofuran (HPLC purity grade). For GC-MS analysis, Supelco Â® 37 component fatty acid methyl ester (FAME) mix in dichloromethane (varied concentrations) was purchased from Sigma-Aldrich.
